title: User Profile Avatar Upload
description: Enable users to upload and display profile avatar images to personalize their account appearance
iWant: to upload a profile avatar image
soThat: I can personalize my account and be easily recognized by other users

acceptanceTests.title: Upload Avatar Image
when: User selects and uploads an image file (JPG, PNG, GIF)
then: Avatar image is displayed in user profile
Image is resized to standard dimensions

acceptanceTests.title: File Type Validation
given: User is on profile settings page
when: User attempts to upload unsupported file type
then: User can try again with valid format

acceptanceTests.title: File Size Validation
given: User selects image file larger than 5MB
when: User attempts to upload the file
then: Error message indicates file size limit

acceptanceTests.title: Avatar Display
when: User views their profile or posts content
then: Avatar image displays consistently across the application
Default placeholder shown if no avatar uploaded
